definition: to be all alone by oneself

sentences.english: I don't want to lonely sitting recalled miss, take up, put down.
sentences.chinese: 我不想孤单坐在回忆了思念，拿得起，放得下。

sentences.english: We find ourselves lonely at the top.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现本身飞得越高，就会越感孤单。

sentences.english: Sharks cruised toward her lone figure, only to be driven away by rifle shots.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼游向她孤单的身躯，只能靠来复枪来击退。

sentences.english: Better to be alone than in bad pany.
sentences.chinese: 宁可孤单也不交坏朋友。

sentences.english: In the darkness, he was graceful and lonely, standing on the top of the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 站在沙发的靠背顶端，高贵又孤单。

sentences.english: Lonely pillow dream shadow lonely moon window.
sentences.chinese: 孤单是枕畔梦影，寂寞是窗前明月。

sentences.english: I am lonely if I have nocompanyon the journey.
sentences.chinese: 旅途中如果没有同伴，我就很孤单。

sentences.english: Better to be alone than in bad company.
sentences.chinese: 宁可孤单也不交坏朋友。

sentences.english: This birthday my aming aware of me was solitary.
sentences.chinese: 这个生日我意识到我是孤单的了。

sentences.english: The lonely person , Asks You to Remember.
You don't feel alone when you have a close friend.
sentences.chinese: 身边有好朋友，你就不会觉得孤单。

sentences.english: Still, Lu is not alone in his survivalist struggle.
sentences.chinese: 但是，陆在其为生存做斗争的路上却并不孤单。

sentences.english: Undoubtly it is lonely when all by yourself. Anyhow, it is safe.
sentences.chinese: 一个人好孤单，但是相当安全。

sentences.english: Because of nonutility spends money lonely, very cheaply with regard to being able to.
sentences.chinese: 因为孤单是廉价的，甚至可以说不用花钱就可以得到。

sentences.english: This year, there have been over 100 such strikes in North Waziristan alone.
sentences.chinese: 今年，已经有超过100家在北瓦济里斯坦罢工孤单。

sentences.english: Don't wait to be lonely , to recognize the value of a friend.
sentences.chinese: 不要等到孤单时，才明白朋友的重要。

definition: to be all alone in the world
with only body and shadow to comfort each other (idiom)/extremely sad and lonely
